    Description
    AdminEventAdapter
    Adapter for displaying Event items in RecyclerView within the Admin view.
    AdminEventAdapter.OnEventClickListener
    Interface for handling click events on Event items.
    AdminEventAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for caching view references within each event card.
    AdminMainFragment
    Main administrative panel fragment providing navigation to various admin sections.
    AdminNotificationAdapter
    Adapter for displaying all notifications in the admin view.
    AdminNotificationAdapter.NotificationWithUser
    Wrapper class to store notification with user information.
    AdminNotificationAdapter.OnNotificationClickListener
    Interface for handling notification click events.
    AdminNotificationFragment
    Fragment for displaying all notifications from all users in the system.
    AdminPosterAdapter
    Adapter for displaying Event posters in a RecyclerView for administrative management.

    Interface for handling click events on poster cards.
    AdminPosterAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for caching view references within each poster card.
    AdminPosterDetailFragment
    Fragment to display the full details of a poster/event for administrative review.
    AdminPosterFragment
    Fragment for displaying all events in the system for administrative management.
    AdminUserAdapter
    Adapter for displaying User objects in a RecyclerView within the Admin view.
    AdminUserAdapter.OnUserActionListener
    Interface for handling user action events.
    AdminUserAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for caching view references within each user card.
    AdminUserFragment
    Fragment for displaying all user profiles from the database in the admin view.

    UI tests for Admin fragment navigation.
    Entrant
     
    Event
    Event models a single event and encapsulates both its metadata (title, dates, organizer, tags, poster/QR) and dynamic participant lists (invited, waiting, enrolled, cancelled).
    EventAdapter
     
    EventQRCodeFragment
    Fragment that displays a QR code for an event Author: Dan
    EventsList
    EventsList manages all Event objects in the Firestore "events" collection.
    EventsList.OnEventsLoadedListener
    Callback interface for asynchronous Firestore operations.
    EventsListTest
    Unit tests for EventsList logic that can be executed without Firestore or Android.
    EventTest
    Unit tests for Event that verify its in-memory behavior (no Firebase or Android dependencies).
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.

    Organizer
    Organizer represents a user with permissions to create and manage events.
    OrganizerAllListsFragment
    OrganizerAllListsFragment displays all entrant-related lists for a selected Event (e.g., invited, waiting, enrolled, cancelled) in an ExpandableListView.
    OrganizerEditPosterFragment
     
    OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter
    OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter is a custom adapter used to populate an ExpandableListView with entrant data for a selected event.
    OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter.OnChildItemClickListener
     
    OrganizerExpandableListsData
    OrganizerExpandableListsData is a utility class that prepares entrant-related lists for display in an ExpandableListView.
    OrganizerExpandableListsDataTest
    Unit tests for OrganizerExpandableListsData, which maps an Event's entrant lists into a HashMap for display in an ExpandableListView.

    OrganizerMainActivity is the entry point for organizer workflows.

    ProfileFragment
    ProfileFragment allows users to view and update their account information Author: Dan Features: - Load current user data from Firebase - Edit profile information (first name, last name, email, phone) - Save changes to Firebase - Input validation - Delete profile (optional)
